sub_fields.instructions: Enter the contact form shortcode (e.g., [contact-form-7 id="123"])

sub_fields.label: Map Embed Code
sub_fields.name: map_embed
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the Google Maps embed code

title: Global Content Blocks

fields.label: Image Frame Block
fields.name: image_frame_block
fields.instructions: Content block with image frame and text

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.placeholder: We embrace innovation to deliver cutting-edge solutions...

sub_fields.label: Terms Text
sub_fields.name: terms_text
sub_fields.default_value: I agree to the Terms and Conditions and consent to receive email updates and newsletters

description: Complete global content blocks for the CDA website

title: Homepage Content

fields.label: Header Section
fields.name: header_section
fields.instructions: Individual header section for homepage only (8.2)

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Admin can set which text is underlined and in which colour

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Block must expand to show all text entered in admin and must NOT cut off text

sub_fields.label: Button 1
sub_fields.name: button1
sub_fields.instructions: Admin has full control over title, URL and if it opens in the current or new tab

sub_fields.label: Button 2
sub_fields.name: button2
sub_fields.instructions: Admin has full control over title, URL and if it opens in the current or new tab

sub_fields.label: Illustration
sub_fields.name: illustration
sub_fields.instructions: Illustration image / video / GIF – will be a file that's uploaded and will play when the user gets to that section

fields.label: Projects Section
fields.name: projects_section
fields.instructions: Individual projects section for homepage - Complete with missing fields needed

fields.label: Case Studies Section
fields.name: case_studies_section
fields.instructions: Individual case studies section for homepage (8.9)

sub_fields.label: Knowledge Hub Link
sub_fields.name: knowledge_hub_link
sub_fields.instructions: Link to the Knowledge hub filtered by Case Studies type

sub_fields.label: Selected Case Studies
sub_fields.name: selected_studies
sub_fields.instructions: Admin will select 2 to show (intro text must be a field in the case study). Fields to show: Client Name, The Challenge, View Project Button with url from the project, Project Gallery

fields.label: Global Content Selection
fields.name: global_content_selection
fields.instructions: Select which global content blocks to display on this page. These will be displayed between the Header and Projects sections in the order they appear in your specifications (8.3-8.12).

sub_fields.label: 8.3 - Enable Image & Frame Block
sub_fields.name: enable_image_frame
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Image & Frame Left, Text & CTA Right block

sub_fields.label: 8.4 - Enable Services Accordion
sub_fields.name: enable_services_accordion
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Services Accordion block

sub_fields.label: 8.5 - Enable Technologies Slider
sub_fields.name: enable_technologies_slider
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Technologies Slider block

sub_fields.label: 8.6 - Enable Values Block
sub_fields.name: enable_values
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Values block

sub_fields.label: 8.7 - Enable Showreel Block
sub_fields.name: enable_showreel
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Showreel block

sub_fields.label: 8.8 - Enable Stats & Image
sub_fields.name: enable_stats_image
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Stats & Image block

sub_fields.label: 8.10 - Enable Locations with Image
sub_fields.name: enable_locations_image
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Locations with Image block

sub_fields.label: 8.11 - Enable News Carousel
sub_fields.name: enable_news_carousel
sub_fields.instructions: Show the News Carousel block

sub_fields.label: 8.12 - Enable Newsletter Signup
sub_fields.name: enable_newsletter_signup
sub_fields.instructions: Show the Newsletter Signup block
